body_html:
Updates:

  • LogitNormal and LogisticNormal are different distributions now (see comments above).
  • Removed InvertibleBoltzmannTransform and implemented LogisticNormal using the StickBreakingTransform (this is cleaner and consistent with Stan).
  • Implemented log_abs_det_jacobianfor the StickBreakingTransform (necessary for computing LogisticNormal.log_prob).
  • Added tests.
body_text:
Updates:

LogitNormal and LogisticNormal are different distributions now (see comments above).
Removed InvertibleBoltzmannTransform and implemented LogisticNormal using the StickBreakingTransform (this is cleaner and consistent with Stan).
Implemented log_abs_det_jacobianfor the StickBreakingTransform (necessary for computing LogisticNormal.log_prob).
Added tests.
body:
Updates:
- `LogitNormal` and `LogisticNormal` are different distributions now (see comments above).
- Removed `InvertibleBoltzmannTransform` and implemented `LogisticNormal` using the `StickBreakingTransform` (this is cleaner and consistent with [Stan](http://mc-stan.org/)).
- Implemented `log_abs_det_jacobian`for the `StickBreakingTransform` (necessary for computing `LogisticNormal.log_prob`).
- Added tests.
